question: I forgot to cover my hair whilst reading Quran
answer:
QUESTION

I have planned for reciting the full quran, so everyday i recite 3-4 pages.. but at one time, i gorogt to wear my head cover. it was ony after i finished reading that it came to my notice.. do i have to recite again the pages that were read that day???

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

You do not have to repeat reading the pages you read while having your head uncovered. However, to have ones head uncovered while reading to Quran is against the honor and respect of the Quran. The Fuqaha have mentioned that it is wajib for one to honor and respect the Quran. 

رجل أراد أن يقرأ القرآن فينبغي أن يكون على أحسن أحواله يلبس صالح ثيابه ويتعمم ويستقبل القبلة لأن تعظيم القرآن والفقه واجب.
(الفتاوى الهندية، 5/316، رشيديه)

 

And Allah knows best

Wassalamu Alaikum

Ml. Sajid bin Shabbir,
Student Darul Iftaa
